n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if x[i] != x[i-1] and x[i] != x[i-2] + 1:
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if x[i] != x[i-1] and x[i] != x[i-1]+1:
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)


n = int(input()) # number of houses
x = list(map(int, input().split())) # location of houses

min_houses = max(x) - min(x) + 1 # minimum number of cameras
max_houses = n # maximum number of cameras

for i in range(n): # loop through the locations of houses
    if x[i] == 1:
        max_houses -= 1 # if house is at the beginning of the street, you can place a camera at the house
    if x[i] == n:
        max_houses -= 1 # if house is at the end of the street, you can place a camera at the house

print(min_houses, max_houses)


n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if x[i] != x[i-1] and (i == n-1 or x[i] != x[i+1]):
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = max(x) - min(x) + 1
max_houses = n

for i in range(n):
    if x[i] == 1:
        max_houses -= 1
    if x[i] == n:
        max_houses -= 1

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
